{"Body_Message":"New products have been added to @{item().DisplayName} in the McKesson TAA Portal that require your prompt attention. 
Please click on the link below to log into your account and complete the certification process as soon as possible. 
For more information, please contact the TAA Portal Team at TAA_Portal@McKesson.com.",
"Ingestion_Layer":"PRODUCT-ADDITION",
"Primary_Name":"@{item().PrimaryName}",
"Primary_Emails":"@{item().PrimaryEmail}",
"Recipient_Emails":"@{item().Recipients}",
"Display_Name":"@{item().DisplayName}",
"Subject_Message":"McKesson TAA Portal – New Products Added to Your Account"}

{"Body_Message":"The certification for @{item().DisplayName} account in the McKesson TAA Portal expires on @{item().ExpirationDate} and requires your prompt attention.

Please login into the McKesson TAA Portal at https://taaportal.mckesson.com to certify your products soonest. Failure to complete the certification in a timely manner may have an adverse impact on sales of your products to our US Federal Government customers. If you need assistance or have additional questions, you may review the TAA Portal Help/FAQ and Contact Us pages.", "Ingestion_Layer":"CERT_EXPIRATION", "Primary_Name":"@{item().PrimaryName}", "Primary_Emails":"@{item().PrimaryEmail}", "Recipient_Emails":"@{item().EmailAddress}", "Display_Name":"@{item().DisplayName}", "Subject_Message":"McKesson TAA Portal – Annual Recertification"}

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT SRC_SCHEMA_NM ,SRC_TABLE_NM ,SRC_QUERY,TGT_SCHEMA_NM,TGT_TABLE_NM,LOAD_TYPE,SRC_TYPE,SRC_KEYVAULT_NM,TGT_KEYVAULT_NM 
 FROM DBO.INGESTION_METADATA 
 WHERE INGESTION_FLAG='Y' 
	   AND LOAD_TYPE='HIST'  
	   AND SRC_TYPE='SQL ON-PREM'
	   Order by EXEC_SEQUENCE

scripts.text:
IF not exists(select top 1 1 from data.COOType where COOId=-2 and [Name]='Non Drug Product' and BiGram='X6' and TriGram='STL' and Number=1001 and IsCompliant=0)
begin
	INSERT INTO  data.COOType (COOId, Name, BiGram,TriGram,Number,IsCompliant,CreatedDate,LastUpdateDate,LastUpdateUser)
		VALUES (-2, 'Non Drug Product','X6','STL',1001,0,GETUTCDATE(),GETUTCDATE(),null);
end
else
begin
	print 'Data Already exists';
end

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT ISNULL(MAX(BATCH_ID),0)+1 as BATCH_ID FROM DBO.BATCH_JOB_ACTIVITY_AUDIT  WHERE STATUS='SUCCEEDED'

SELECT 
 MTD.SRC_SCHEMA_NM ,MTD.SRC_TABLE_NM ,MTD.SRC_QUERY,MTD.TGT_SCHEMA_NM,MTD.TGT_TABLE_NM,MTD.LOAD_TYPE,MTD.SRC_TYPE,MTD.SRC_KEYVAULT_NM,MTD.TGT_KEYVAULT_NM, BJA.BATCH_ID
 FROM dbo.Ingestion_Metadata MTD
 INNER JOIN 
 (SELECT SRC_TBL_NM , TGT_TBL_NM,BATCH_ID FROM DBO.BATCH_JOB_ACTIVITY_AUDIT WHERE  BATCH_ID=(SELECT ISNULL(MAX(BATCH_ID),0) AS BATCH_ID FROM DBO.BATCH_JOB_ACTIVITY_AUDIT WHERE STATUS='FAILED') AND  STATUS='FAILED')BJA
 ON 
 concat(MTD.SRC_SCHEMA_NM,'.',MTD.SRC_TABLE_NM)=BJA.SRC_TBL_NM
 AND 
 concat(MTD.TGT_SCHEMA_NM,'.',MTD.TGT_TABLE_NM)=BJA.TGT_TBL_NM
 AND  MTD.INGESTION_FLAG='Y' and MTD.LOAD_TYPE='HIST' and MTD.SRC_TYPE='SQL ON-PREM'

scripts.text:
IF not exists(select top 1 1 from data.COOType where COOId=-2 and [Name]='Non Drug Product' and BiGram='X6' and TriGram='STL' and Number=1001 and IsCompliant=0)
begin
	INSERT INTO  data.COOType (COOId, Name, BiGram,TriGram,Number,IsCompliant,CreatedDate,LastUpdateDate,LastUpdateUser)
		VALUES (-2, 'Non Drug Product','X6','STL',1001,0,GETUTCDATE(),GETUTCDATE(),null);
end
else
begin
	print 'Data Already exists';
end

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT TGT_SCHEMA_NM,TGT_TABLE_NM,LOAD_TYPE,SRC_TYPE,TGT_KEYVAULT_NM FROM DBO.INGESTION_METADATA WHERE INGESTION_FLAG='Y' and SRC_TYPE='Azure SQL DB' ORDER BY EXEC_SEQUENCE

SELECT 
 MTD.SRC_SCHEMA_NM ,MTD.SRC_TABLE_NM ,MTD.SRC_QUERY,MTD.TGT_SCHEMA_NM,MTD.TGT_TABLE_NM,MTD.LOAD_TYPE,MTD.SRC_TYPE,MTD.SRC_KEYVAULT_NM,MTD.TGT_KEYVAULT_NM, BJA.BATCH_ID
 FROM dbo.Ingestion_Metadata MTD
 INNER JOIN 
 (SELECT SRC_TBL_NM , TGT_TBL_NM,BATCH_ID FROM DBO.BATCH_JOB_ACTIVITY_AUDIT WHERE  BATCH_ID=(SELECT ISNULL(MAX(BATCH_ID),0) AS BATCH_ID FROM DBO.BATCH_JOB_ACTIVITY_AUDIT WHERE STATUS='FAILED') AND  STATUS='FAILED')BJA
 ON 
 concat(MTD.SRC_SCHEMA_NM,'.',MTD.SRC_TABLE_NM)=BJA.SRC_TBL_NM
 AND 
 concat(MTD.TGT_SCHEMA_NM,'.',MTD.TGT_TABLE_NM)=BJA.TGT_TBL_NM
 AND  MTD.INGESTION_FLAG='Y' and MTD.LOAD_TYPE='DAILY' and MTD.SRC_TYPE='SAP HANA'
